Members.Name: Captain Solar
Members.Superpower: Solar energy manipulation > can absorb, store, and release solar energy for various uses including flight, energy blasts, and enhanced strength.
Members.Background: A former astronaut who gained his powers during a mission when his spacecraft was hit by a solar flare.

Members.Name: AquaMancer
Members.Superpower: Water control > can manipulate water in all its forms, create water constructs, and breathe underwater.
Members.Background: An oceanographer who discovered an ancient artifact granting him the ability to control water.

Members.Name: ShadowHawk
Members.Superpower: Shadow manipulation > can blend into shadows, create shadow constructs, and teleport short distances through shadows.
Members.Background: A former special forces operative who was transformed during a covert mission gone wrong.

Members.Name: Terra Titan
Members.Superpower: Earth manipulation > can control earth and stone, create seismic shockwaves, and has superhuman strength.
Members.Background: An archaeologist who unearthed an ancient relic that bonded with him, granting him control over the earth.

Members.Name: Vortex
Members.Superpower: Wind and air manipulation > can generate powerful winds, fly, and create tornadoes and air shields.
Members.Background: A meteorologist who was caught in a freak storm and gained the ability to control the wind.

Members.Name: PyroPhantom
Members.Superpower: Fire control > can generate and control fire, create fire constructs, and is immune to heat and flames.
Members.Background: A firefighter who gained fire-controlling abilities after a mysterious explosion at a chemical plant.

Members.Name: CryoMist
Members.Superpower: Ice and cold manipulation > can generate and control ice, create ice constructs, and lower temperatures.
Members.Background: A scientist working in cryogenics who accidentally infused herself with experimental cryo-serum.

Members.Name: ElectroSurge
Members.Superpower: Electricity control > can generate and manipulate electricity, create electrical constructs, and move at lightning speed.
Members.Background: An electrical engineer struck by lightning while working on a high-voltage power line, gaining electrical powers.

Members.Name: GeoGuard
Members.Superpower: Geomagnetic manipulation > can control magnetic fields and metals, create magnetic constructs, and has enhanced durability.
Members.Background: A geophysicist who discovered a rare mineral granting him the power to control magnetic fields.

Members.Name: PsyWave
Members.Superpower: Psychic abilities > telepathy, telekinesis, and mind control.
Members.Background: A psychologist who developed psychic abilities after a near-death experience during a lab experiment.
